# The `MCSection` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Instances of this class represent a uniqued identifier for a section in the current translation unit. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCSection</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Instances of this class represent a uniqued identifier for a section in the current translation unit.

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> class uniques and creates these.

Definition at line 36 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsection-h">MCSection.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>
